import React from 'react' export const AnimeInfo = (props) => { const {title,images:{jpg:{large_image_url}},source,rank,score,popularity,members,status,rating,duration}=props.animeInfo return ( <>

{title}




#Rank: {rank}

#Score: {score}

#Popularity: {popularity}


Members:{members}

Source:{source}

Duration:{duration}

Status:{status}

Rating:{rating}

) }
